tax_codes.name: Professional Services
tax_codes.description: Professional services which are not subject to a service-specific tax levy.

tax_codes.name: Clothing
tax_codes.description: All human wearing apparel suitable for general use

tax_codes.name: Digital Goods
tax_codes.description: Digital products transferred electronically, meaning obtained by the purchaser by means other than tangible storage media.

tax_codes.name: Soft Drinks
tax_codes.description: Soft drinks, soda, and other similar beverages. Does not include fruit juices and water.

tax_codes.name: Bottled Water
tax_codes.description: Bottled, drinkable water for human consumption.

tax_codes.name: Prepared Foods
tax_codes.description: Foods intended for on-site consumption. Ex. Restaurant meals.
